title: A Better Life
overview: 39-year-old insurance agent Hu Manli, who rose from humble beginnings and fought her way up in society, suddenly faces underhanded competition at the peak of her career, with both her professional and personal life thrown into turmoil. The mastermind behind it all turns out to be 28-year-old Xue Xiaozhou, a down-and-out rich heir who had just entered the insurance industry. After several confrontations, the two uncover the truth behind their conflict, gradually resolve their misunderstandings, and decide to join forces. Through clashes of values and shared experiences in the trials of life, they form an unbeatable partnership, becoming both mentor and friend to each other while achieving business success and discovering their true selves.
